dict.acceptation: 风；呼吸；（随食物或饮料）吞下的气；（管弦乐团的）管乐器；
缠绕；卷绕；转动（把手）；给…上发条；

sent.orig: From wind bell, wind fist, and wind stick to wind flag, Shaolin kungfu shakes the forest.
sent.trans: 风铃、风拳、风棍、风旗，少林武术掀起了山岳林涛。

sent.orig: Wind-Most wind turbines generate electricity occurring wind.
sent.trans: 风-大多数风力涡轮机依靠自然风发电。

sent.orig: The optional wind deflector minimizes drafts and wind turbulence, eliminating wind chill and maximising comfort.
sent.trans: 作为备选设备的挡风板也以有效的防止气流干扰，消除风冷，优化舒适度。

sent.orig: Wind conditions, the year leading wind direction, prevailing southeasterly winds in summer, winter prevailing wind.
sent.trans: 风况，全年主导风向，夏季盛行东南风，冬季盛行西北风。

sent.orig: When a bird aloft on the wind, it forgets wind that is helping it to fly.
sent.trans: 鱼得水逝，而相忘乎水；鸟乘风飞，而不知有风。识次可以超物累，可以乐天机。
